body_html:
@ChenChuang , can you be more specific which function were you referring to? I do not see RecvLocalAsync is defined in rdma_rendezvous_mgr.cc.

The error handling part of contrib/verbs is weak, partially because I do not know what to do when verbs fails, except restarting the whole process. Your suggestions, comments and contributions (pull-request) are welcome.

body:
@ChenChuang , can you be more specific which function were you referring to? I do not see RecvLocalAsync is defined in rdma_rendezvous_mgr.cc. 

The error handling part of contrib/verbs is weak, partially because I do not know what to do when verbs fails, except restarting the whole process. Your suggestions, comments and contributions (pull-request) are welcome.
